languages.text: {n}Закутанный в алую рясу {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} приветствует вас негромким голосом, синтезированным вокс-системой:{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все, {name}". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендриты{/g}, растущие из спины техножреца, нацеливаются на вас, будто с любопытством рассматривая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Закутанный в алую рясу {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} приветствует вас негромким голосом, синтезированным вокс-системой:{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все, {name}". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Механодендриты{/g}, растущие из спины техножреца, нацеливаются на вас, будто с любопытством рассматривая.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Закутанный в алую рясу {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} приветствует вас негромким голосом, синтезированным вокс-системой:{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все, {name}". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендриты{/g}, растущие из спины техножреца, нацеливаются на вас, будто с любопытством рассматривая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tech-priest{/g} wrapped in a crimson robe greets you with a soft voice, synthesized by the vox-system:{/n} "Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}". {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechanodendrites{/g} growing from the tech-priest's back aim at you, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tech-priest{/g} wrapped in a crimson robe greets you with a soft voice, synthesized by the vox-system:{/n} "Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}". {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechanodendrites{/g} growing from the tech-priest's back aim at you, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} shrouded in a crimson robe greets you with a soft voice synthesized by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the Tech-Priest's back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} shrouded in a crimson robe greets you with a soft voice synthesized by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the Tech-Priest's back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡罩在他的深红色长袍之下，音阵合成器中发出了柔和的合成音，向你致意。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓，{name}”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}背上伸出的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}转向了你的方向，似乎在好奇地打量着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡罩在他的深红色长袍之下，音阵合成器中发出了柔和的合成音，向你致意。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓，{name}”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}背上伸出的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}转向了你的方向，似乎在好奇地打量着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, cubierto por su túnica carmesí, te saluda con una voz suave sintetizada por su sistema de vocos:{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo, {name}». {n}Las {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} que salen de la espalda del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} se giran hacia ti, como si te examinaran con curiosidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, cubierto por su túnica carmesí, te saluda con una voz suave sintetizada por su sistema de vocos:{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo, {name}». {n}Las {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} que salen de la espalda del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} se giran hacia ti, como si te examinaran con curiosidad.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}真紅のローブに身を包んだパスカルが、ヴォクスシンセサイザーによる柔らかな声で挨拶する{/n}「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包むのです、{name}様」{n}好奇心で探るかのように、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の背中から生えている{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}があなたの方を振り向く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}真紅のローブに身を包んだパスカルが、ヴォクスシンセサイザーによる柔らかな声で挨拶する{/n}「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包むのです、{name}様」{n}好奇心で探るかのように、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の背中から生えている{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}があなたの方を振り向く。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, in seine rote Robe gehüllt, begrüßt dich mit der sanften synthetischen Stimme des Voxsystems:{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles, {name}." {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g}, die aus dem Rücken des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} wachsen, drehen sich zu dir, als würden sie dich neugierig mustern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, in seine rote Robe gehüllt, begrüßt dich mit der sanften synthetischen Stimme des Voxsystems:{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles, {name}." {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g}, die aus dem Rücken des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} wachsen, drehen sich zu dir, als würden sie dich neugierig mustern.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Enveloppé dans sa robe écarlate, Pasqal vous salue d'une voix douce synthétisée par son système-vox :{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout, {name}. » {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} qui sortent du dos du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} pivotent dans votre direction, comme si elles vous examinaient avec curiosité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Enveloppé dans sa robe écarlate, Pasqal vous salue d'une voix douce synthétisée par son système-vox :{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout, {name}. » {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} qui sortent du dos du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} pivotent dans votre direction, comme si elles vous examinaient avec curiosité.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, ." {n}The mechadendrites growing out of the Tech-Priest's back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kızıl cübbesinin içindeki Pasqal, voks sistemi tarafından sentezlenen yumuşak bir sesle seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} sırtından çıkan {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritler{/g}, sana doğru sokuluyor. Seni merakla inceliyor gibiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, shrouded in his crimson robe, greets you with a soft voice synthesised by the vox-system:{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all, {name}." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} growing out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s back swivel in your direction, as if examining you with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl cübbesinin içindeki Pasqal, voks sistemi tarafından sentezlenen yumuşak bir sesle seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır {name}." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in sırtından çıkan {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritler{/g} sana doğru sokuluyor. Seni merakla inceliyor gibiler.{/n}
